title: Project for Decoration of Ceiling
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on light green laid paper
description: Four rhombus with Bacchus, Cerere, Ganymede, Hebe; two tondi with the Seasons; thirteen tondi with cupids; seven decorative folders; octagonal with masks.
